text: Soni naga mundu chili chinkwayiye chakusausya akasatuŵendaga ali agonile chamumbalati mwakwe, kapena chitamile, kapena chiimile, basi ndema jatukuntyochesyaga chakusausya chakwecho akwendelechelaga (mu ukafili wakwe) nti chisawu nganatuŵendeje pa chakusausya chachankwayiye, iyyoyopeyo ni yaitite pakunonyelesyedwa kwa akupelenganya malile (pa sambi) ya aŵele ali nkupanganya
